annotation: <data-piece><history><entry><input>node server.js</input><output>Server running at http://localhost:3000</output><annotation>Start the Node.js server.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry><entry><input>curl http://localhost:3000</input><output>Welcome to the Node.js server!</output><annotation>Test the server by making a request.</annotation><annotation>Verify the response from the server.</annotation></entry><entry><input>ps aux | grep node</input><output>user  1234  0.0  0.1  4500  3000 ?        S    10:01   0:00 node server.js</output><annotation>Check the running process of the Node.js server.</annotation><annotation>Confirm that the server is running in the background.</annotation></entry><entry><input>kill 1234</input><output></output><annotation>Stop the Node.js server by killing the process.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry></history><current-entry><entry><input>exit</input><output>exit</output><annotation>End the session after managing the Node.js server.</annotation><annotation></annotation></entry></current-entry></data-piece>
